cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and potential system instability.

du.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to an out-of-range value (1000) will cause SCTP connection establishment failure and F1 interface issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SCTP_INSTREAMS 設定為超出範圍的值 (1000)，會導致 SCTP 連接建立失敗，並造成 F1 介面問題。
